fields.name: mc
fields.title: Measure Count
fields.description: Running count of encoded <Measure> tags which do not necessarily express a full measure (e.g. in case of an anacrusis).

fields.name: mn
fields.title: Measure Number
fields.description: Measure number as printed in the score, computed from mc, dont_count and numbering_offset.

fields.name: quarterbeats
fields.title: Offset from Beginning
fields.description: Distance of an event from the piece's beginning. By default, only second endings are taken into account to reflect the proportions of a simply playthrough without repeats.

fields.name: duration_qb
fields.title: Duration in ♩
fields.description: A float corresponding to duration * 4

fields.name: mc_onset
fields.title: Offset within Encoded Measure
fields.description: Distance of an event from the beginning of the <Measure> tag.

fields.name: mn_onset
fields.title: Offset within Logical Measure
fields.description: Distance from the beginning of the logical measure. Relevant, for example, to compute the metric position of an event.

fields.name: timesig
fields.title: Time Signature
fields.description: Given as string, e.g. "4/4".

fields.name: staff
fields.title: Staff
fields.description: Number of the staff where an event occurs, 1 designating the top staff.

fields.name: voice
fields.title: Notational Layer
fields.description: A number between 1-4 where 1 is MuseScore's default layer (blue), 2 the second layer in green with downward stems, etc.

fields.name: absolute_base
fields.title: Int64
fields.description: MuseScore encoding the bass pitch class of an absolute chord label, as MuseScore tonal pitch class such that C=14, G=15, etc.

fields.name: absolute_root
fields.title: Absolute Root
fields.description: MuseScore encoding the root pitch class of an absolute chord label, as MuseScore tonal pitch class such that C=14, G=15, etc.

fields.name: color_a
fields.title: Color Alpha
fields.description: Value between 0 and 255

fields.name: color_b
fields.title: Color Blue
fields.description: Value between 0 and 255

fields.name: color_g
fields.title: Color Green
fields.description: Value between 0 and 255

fields.name: color_r
fields.title: Color Red
fields.description: Value between 0 and 255

fields.name: harmony_layer
fields.title: Harmony Encoding Layer
fields.description:
0: "Simple string (does not begin with a note name, otherwise MS3 will turn it into type 3; prevent through leading dot)",
1: "MuseScore's Roman Numeral Annotation format",
2: "MuseScore's Nashville Number format",
3: "Absolute chord encoded by MuseScore

fields.name: label
fields.title: Label
fields.description: String corresponding to the entire annotation label.

fields.name: nashville
fields.title: Nashville
fields.description: Numbering system that specifies the root of a chord as scale degree of the local key, e.g. "1", "b3", "#5", "b7".

fields.name: offset_x
fields.title: Horizontal Offset
fields.description: Pertaining to MuseScore encoding.

fields.name: offset_y
fields.title: Vertical Offset
fields.description: Pertaining to MuseScore encoding.

fields.name: regex_match
fields.title: Regular Expression Match
fields.description: The name of the first registered regular expression matching a label. By default, these include "dcml" and "form_labels".

fields.name: rootCase
fields.title: Root Case
fields.description: Pertaining to MuseScore encoding.

creator.name: ms3
creator.description: A parser for MuseScore 3 files and data factory for annotated music corpora.
